description: A side navigation component. This is displayed at the larger-than-tablet breakpoint and hidden at tablet and below. Use this to display menus, navigation or other items related to the main page content. A side nave had two slots, one for sticky content which remains visible at all times. The other is for scrolling content which is allowed to overflow below the bottom of the page.

props.name: fullWidth
props.description: If true, removes the side nav component's padding.
